name: Disease Detector
initialMessage: I can help with that. To get started, please tell me which crop you want to diagnose. You can choose from wheat, rice, sugarcane, cotton, or pulses.

steps.message: Which crop do you want to diagnose?
Great. Now, please upload an image of the affected plant, or you can say 'open camera' to take a picture.
I've captured the image. I will now start the analysis. This might take a moment.
